actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to require the establishment of procedures to assure that benefit payments will not be made thereunder to deceased individuals.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Serivces to establish procedures to prevent the payment of title II benefits to deceased individuals. Provides that, to the extent feasible, such procedures shall require State and local officials to certify periodically to the Secretary the names of all individuals within their jurisdiction with respect to whom death certificates are issued.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to require the establishment of procedures to assure that benefit payments will not be made thereunder to deceased individuals.
